short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dingshi is an excellent yet robust timer & stopwatch. Create one or multiple custom timers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dingshi is an excellent yet robust timer & stopwatch. With this extension, you have the power to create one or multiple custom timers. It's perfect for anyone whether you are a student,chef, or just want to time yourself doing stuff. It's for everyone! Suitable for the popular pomodoro learning, this extension also has start, pause, stop, reset buttons for both the stopwatch and timer. You also get an audio notification once a timer runs out. I hope you enjoy this extension.
